subject: Fwd: DropBox Link
preview: Our school program was created to ensure each child is offered a well-rounded dance experience beyond the classroom. The aim is to bring more positive interactions on across each of our streams (a

full_threads.body:
Our school program was created to ensure each child is offered a well-rounded dance experience beyond the classroom. The aim is to bring more positive interactions on across each of our streams (age groups) and as a whole school. The programs throughout the year includes team building events, how to's on building strength, technique, flexibility and endurance, while broadening minds & experiences to the world of dance (exposing students and their talents to the wider industry), as well as mentorship from our older students and overall bonding. With this in mind, the program calendar is designed to benefit every student from each stream.



email address: info@studiohdance.com.au

HI @heath im done with the revisions. the only thing i skipped is their inquiry below. Thanks

Lastly, we definitely wanted to implement the info@studioh.com.au email. Would it be possible to set this up or should we be doing it?
Please let us know what you need? Of course once this is done, we will need to update the email address on the CONTACT US page and anywhere there is a CTA to email.

action.text: Heath Maguire assigned to Glen Tenorio

full_threads.body:
@glen can you please action the below. I have also sent to your email address in case any of the images etc are striped out by HelpScout.

Thanks!

HEATH MAGUIRE
CREATIVE DIRECTOR - WOLFIQ.COM.AU

E. heath@wolfiq.com.au | P. 1300 072 134 | M. 0415 162 271


Begin forwarded message:

From: Eleni Nikolopoulos <studiohdanceacademy2@gmail.com>
Subject: Re: DropBox Link
Date: 4 March 2020 at 6:46:59 pm AEDT
To: Heath Maguire <heath@wolfiq.com.au>

Hi Heath,

Hope you are well.

Very few minor things.

On this page - https://studiohdance.com.au/about-us/, please can you either remove or swap out this image, as this is not one of our studio shots.


on the same page ABOUT US - we need to update the copy below as per the homepage -

Our school program was created to ensure each child is offered a well-rounded dance experience beyond the classroom. The aim is to bring more positive interactions on across each of our streams (age groups) and as a whole school. The programs throughout the year includes team building events, how to's on building strength, technique, flexibility and endurance, while broadening minds & experiences to the world of dance (exposing students and their talents to the wider industry), as well as mentorship from our older students and overall bonding. With this in mind, the program calendar is designed to benefit every student from each stream.


Also please can the READY SET DANCE be adjusted on the below to capitals and/or no commas.

This is on the homepage;




This is on the READY SET DANCE PAGE - https://studiohdance.com.au/ready-set-dance/



And the below is on the dropdown;



On the ACTIVE AND CREATIVE KIDS page - https://studiohdance.com.au/active-and-creative-kids/
Please can the email be adjusted to read; studiohactive19@gmail.com
On this page please can we also change the $ value from $100 to $300*. Both at the top of page and in the copy below.
*The sentence should now read; Parents, guardians and carers can apply for vouchers valued up to $300 for the program.m.

On the HOMEPAGE can we change the copy here to the below copy;


A NSW government initiative, offering parents up to $300 per child participating in either an active or creative program.


Lastly, we definitely wanted to implement the info@studioh.com.au email. Would it be possible to set this up or should we be doing it?
Please let us know what you need? Of course once this is done, we will need to update the email address on the CONTACT US page and anywhere there is a CTA to email.

Looking forward to these final changes and getting the website live. Really appreciate all your help Heath!!

Best,
Eleni

Our school program was created to ensure each child is offered a well-rounded dance experience beyond the classroom. The aim is to bring more positive interactions on across each of our streams (age groups) and as a whole school. The programs throughout the year includes team building events, how to's on building strength, technique, flexibility and endurance, while broadening minds & experiences to the world of dance (exposing students and their talents to the wider industry), as well as mentorship from our older students and overall bonding. With this in mind, the program calendar is designed to benefit every student from each stream.

ABOUT US PAGE

READY SET DANCE (in captials, no commas and with the Y)

Please ensure, site wide anywhere it means READY SET DANCE that it is in captials with no commas.

Happy to jump on a call to discuss if there is anything that you are unsure of.

Thank you so much!

Eleni
